          <title>
            <string language="en">The expansion pipe in a hot water system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Expansion Rohr in einem Heißwassersystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pipe d'expansion dans un système d'eau 
chaude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tubulação da expansão em um sistema da água
quente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tubo di espansione in un sistema dell'acqua 
calda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σωλήνας επέκτασης σε ένα σύστημα καυτού ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tubo de la extensión en un sistema de la agua 
caliente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the expansion of heated water necessitates the installation of an expansion pipe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß die Expansion des 
lebhaften Wassers die Installation eines Expansion Rohres erfordert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que l'expansion de l'eau de 
chauffage rend nécessaire l'installation d'une pipe d'expansion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que a expansão da água 
aquecida necessita a instalação de uma tubulação da expansão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che l'espansione di acqua 
riscaldata rende necessaria l'installazione di un tubo di espansione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι η επέκταση του 
θερμαμένου ύδατος απαιτεί την εγκατάσταση ενός σωλήνα 
επέκτασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la extensión del agua 
calentada hace necesario la instalación de un tubo de la extensión.</string>
          </description>
